channel.title: [634] Editing character info
channel.description: Yes I just upgraded to 634 (trying to get used to this coding, different from my 317 lol) and i'm trying to edit characters, to make myself owner and such. However the files are in a .bin format How do I open a .bin file? I tried w/ wordpad/notepad but theres a bunch of wierd symbols

item.title: [634] Editing character info
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

In a 634 and such maybe look in actionsender.java and search for like “setright = 2”. Then change that name to yours. GL!

Read full topic
